name: part_008
file: tmp_[#AkiRoseBirthday2021] 3D birthday celebration in my first idol costume! [HoloLive⧸AkiRose] [1Ts7X3vtYgQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal finishes her drink and talks to the audience about her dream of performing in an idol costume.
Aki Rosenthal performs the song 'Diamond Crevasse'.

subtitles.original: 飲ませてください
subtitles.english: Please let me take a drink.

subtitles.original: ちょっとここにね、みんなお水が
subtitles.english: Just here, everyone, the water is...

subtitles.original: よいしょ
subtitles.english: There we go.

subtitles.original: あはは、ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Ahaha, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: やっぱね、この自分の配信でアイドル衣装を着てね、
subtitles.english: After all, being able to wear an idol costume on my stream,

subtitles.original: 歌って踊れるのすごい夢だったので、今めちゃくちゃ楽しいです
subtitles.english: and singing and dancing in it was a big dream, so I'm having a lot of fun!

subtitles.original: ということで、続いてもう一曲、歌いたいと思います。
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to sing one more song.

subtitles.original: え、この曲をね、とても、え、気持ちを込めて歌える歌なんじゃないかなと、思っています。
subtitles.english: Um, I feel like this is a song that I can really pour my heart into.

subtitles.original: それでは、聞いてください
subtitles.english: Now, please listen.

subtitles.original: ダイアモンド クレバス
subtitles.english: Diamond Crevasse

subtitles.original: Wow oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Wow oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: Wow oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Wow oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: 神様に恋をしていた頃は
subtitles.english: Back when I was in love with God,

subtitles.original: こんな別れが来るとは思ってなかったよ
subtitles.english: I never thought a parting like this would come.

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: もう二度と触れない、触れないんだ
subtitles.english: I can never touch you again, I never will.

subtitles.original: 全て最後に
subtitles.english: For the very last time,

subtitles.original: もう一度抱きしめて欲しかったよ
subtitles.english: I wanted you to hold me once more.

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: It's long long goodbye
subtitles.english: It's long long goodbye

subtitles.original: サヨナラ サヨナラ なのだって
subtitles.english: Farewell, farewell. Even though it's so,

subtitles.original: 自分に無情に言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: I ruthlessly tell myself.

subtitles.original: 手を振るのは優しさだよ
subtitles.english: Waving my hand is an act of kindness.

subtitles.original: 今強さが欲しい
subtitles.english: Right now, I want strength.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会いたかった 輝いて私生まれて
subtitles.english: I'm glad I met you. I was born to shine.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ 愛合えばこそ
subtitles.english: Because I love you, because we love each other.

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待ってどうなるの
subtitles.english: What's the point of waiting for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙ににじむ 星のまたたきは
subtitles.english: Twinkling stars, blurred by my tears,

subtitles.original: 琥珀
subtitles.english: are like amber.

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ あなたのぬくもりも
subtitles.english: I won't forget your warmth,

subtitles.original: その優しさも
subtitles.english: or your kindness,

subtitles.original: 全て包んでくれた お手手
subtitles.english: or your hands that wrapped around everything.

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: It's long long goodbye
subtitles.english: It's long long goodbye

subtitles.original: サヨナラ サヨナラ 愛おしき人
subtitles.english: Farewell, farewell, my beloved.

subtitles.original: あなたがいたから 歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: Because you were there, I could walk this far.

subtitles.original: 一人なんかじゃなかったよね
subtitles.english: I wasn't alone, was I?

subtitles.original: 今答えが欲しい
subtitles.english: Right now, I want an answer.

subtitles.original: 燃えるような流星捕まえて 火を灯して
subtitles.english: Catching a burning shooting star, lighting a fire,

subtitles.original: 愛していたい 愛されてたい
subtitles.english: I want to love, I want to be loved.

subtitles.original: 消えた体 一つで世界はどうなるの
subtitles.english: What happens to the world with just one body gone?

subtitles.original: 哀し続けて 巨星が溶けて燃える
subtitles.english: Continuing to mourn, the giant star melts and burns.

subtitles.original: どうしてなの
subtitles.english: Why is it

subtitles.original: 涙溢れて 止められない
subtitles.english: that tears overflow and I can't stop them?
